actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 13, United States Code, to provide for Congressional disapproval of question proposed to be included in censuses conducted by the Secretary of Commerce.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Commerce to submit to Congress all of the questions to be included in any quinquennial census of: (1) manufacturers, mineral industries, and other businesses; (2) agriculture; or (3) governments. Prohibits the Secretary from including in any such census or in the decennial census of the population any question which is not submitted to Congress, or which both Houses of Congress disapprove by concurrent resolution.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 13, United States Code, to provide for Congressional disapproval of question proposed to be included in censuses conducted by the Secretary of Commerce.
